references.paper_title: Flamingo: a Visual Language Model for Few-Shot Learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Flamingo, a Vision Language Model (VLM) that is foundational to the ART framework's ability to understand and analyze images, a key component in the proposed red-teaming approach.

references.paper_title: LLaMA: Open and Efficient Foundation Language Models
references.reason: The LLaMA model, introduced in this paper, forms the basis of the ART framework's Language Model (LLM) component and is fundamental to generating and manipulating prompts.
The transformer architecture, introduced in this highly influential paper, underpins the fundamental architecture of both the LLM and VLM used in the ART framework.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a key text-to-image model used in the ART framework for experiments, allowing a direct investigation of its vulnerabilities.

references.paper_title: Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback
references.reason: This paper introduces methods for training language models to follow instructions which directly informs the training process of the LLM utilized by the ART framework
